abstract.text: Learn how to optimize your app‚Äôs user experience with Swift concurrency as we update an existing sample app. We‚Äôll start with a main-actor app, then gradually introduce asynchronous code as we need to. abstract.text: Learn how to mix C, C++, and Swift while improving the safety of your apps. We‚Äôll show you how to find where unsafe C and C++ APIs are called in your Swift code, how to call them more safely, and how to make your app‚Äôs existing C and C++ code safer by default.
